name: multi-languages-url
description: This simple tool for creating URL links adapted to the current language of the web application.
author: Alexander Ivannikov <a.n.ivannikov@yandex.ru> (https://github.com/an-ivannikov)

scripts.copy:win: copy dist\umd\MultiLanguagesURL.min.js MultiLanguagesURL.min.js && copy dist\umd\MultiLanguagesURL.js MultiLanguagesURL.js
scripts.build:umd: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd --uglify
scripts.build:amd: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format amd && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format umd --uglify
scripts.build:iife: rollup -c rollup.config.js --format iife && rollup -c rollup.config.js --format iife --uglify
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:es && npm run build:umd && npm run copy
scripts.build:win: npm run clean && npm run build:cjs && npm run build:win:es && npm run build:umd && npm run copy:win
